WorkFeedback.name: WorkFeedback
WorkFeedback.description: Represents the answer to a question that a person was asked via a feedback request. Also used to store offered feedback without linking it to a particular question.

Feedback.description: Contains either the free-form text of the answer, or the choice selected by the user. Max length is 65536.

Name.description: The name of the WorkFeedback record.

OwnerId.description: ID of the owner of the WorkFeedback record.

QuestionId.description: The question this answer applies to. When this feedback is linked to a request of an unsolicited type, the question ID is null.

RequestId.description: The ID of the request this response belongs to, in case of offered feedback.
